name: py-wincertstore
description:
wincertstore provides an interface to access Windows' CA and CRL
certificates. It uses ctypes and Windows's sytem cert store API through
crypt32.dll.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-python-certifi-win32
dependent_to.description:
This package patches certifi at runtime to also include certificates
from the windows certificate store.
